summary: An impetuous teenage girl, resentful of her father's new wife, tries to wreck the marriage regardless of the consequences.
cast: David Farrar|Noëlle Adam|Christopher Lee|Gillian Hills|Adam Faith|Shirley Anne Field|Peter McEnery|Claire Gordon|Oliver Reed|Michael Kayne|Anthony Singleton|Robert Raglan|Nade Beall|Margot Bryant|Nigel Green|Norman Mitchell|Pascaline|Christina Curry|Diane D'Orsay|Rodney Dines|Delphi Lawrence|John Tatham|Reg Thomason|Carol White
title: Beat Girl
